snippet: Two top finance officials gave a push forward to create a unified banking regulator, easing concerns that the bloc is failing to move swiftly enough to avoid future crises.
abstract: Top European finance officials give push forward to efforts to overhaul governance of European Union's banks, easing concerns that bloc is failing to move quickly enough to avoid future crisis that could sink the euro.

byline.original: By JAMES KANTER and NICHOLAS KULISH

lead_paragraph: Two top finance officials gave a push forward to create a unified banking regulator, easing concerns that the bloc is failing to move swiftly enough to avoid future crises.

headline.main: Backing Grows for European Bank Plan
headline.print_headline: European Finance Officials inNew Call for Unified Banking
